snippet: Michael Kidd-Gilchrist had a career-high 25 points and 12 rebounds as Charlotte ended a 16-game losing streak against Dallas.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Charlotte Bobcats defeat Dallas Mavericks, 101-97, in overtime; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Michael Kidd-Gilchrist had a career-high 25 points and 12 rebounds as Charlotte ended a 16-game losing streak against Dallas.

headline.seo: Rookie Michael Kidd-Gilchrist’s Double-Double Helps Bobcats Top Mavericks
headline.main: Bobcats, Led by Rookie, Finally Defeat Mavericks
headline.print_headline: Bobcats, Led by Rookie, Finally Defeat Mavericks
